tvdb: Lucy tells Rafe and Ali about Livvie's loss.  Rafe and Lucy react negatively to the song ""Naked Eyes,"" then discuss their mutual feeling about something eerie in town.  Lucy encourages Ali to seek closure with her estranged mother.  Joshua tells Ricky that Stephen Clay is only interested in Marissa and not Ricky.  Marissa shows Jamal new lyrics she wrote for Stephen Clay and he urges her to be cautious with the mysterious Stephen.  Marissa and Jamal begin to make love, but are secretly spied on by Joshua through a hidden camera.  Joshua copies Marissa's newest lyrics and declares she won't keep any secrets.
